While in her lava dimension, Kaguya causes lava plumes to rise around her, either to attack nearby opponents or to block incoming attacks.

==Trivia==
* This technique takes its name from one of the impossible tasks set by Kaguya-hime in the [[Wikipedia:The Tale of the Bamboo Cutter|Tale of the Bamboo Cutter]].
